definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: crushed, oppressed—[[דַּךְ]] Ps 74:21; [[דָָּךְ]] Ps 9:10, Ps 10:18; pl. sf. [[דַּכָָּו]] Pr 26:28 (Baer; edd. al. [[דַּכָּיו]])—poet.; always fig., oppressed, distressed Ps 9:10, Ps 10:18 (‖[[יתום]]) Ps 74:21(‖[[עָנִי]] and [[אביון]]); Pr 26:28 [[דַּכָּו]] = those crushed by it (a lying tongue).
